name: Tarademo
0:
”Alexa open tara demo”
”Alexa ask tara demo to help”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tara demo
des: This skill is meant for learners who are at the CEFR A1 level. It teaches basic English for communication in a variety of situations. This skill teaches phrases and expresssions used in various everyday situations, for self introductions. It also teaches few vocabulary words. NO PERSONAL INFORMATION IS ACCEPTED/STORED BY THE SKILL.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
